Authors: Alfiansyah, Puspitarini A., Gomgom, Kriswandi J., Setiadi T., Rokanta S.A.
Title: Analysis of the effect of baca meter implementation and user ability on employee performance of sub bagian pembaca meter in PDAM kota balikpapan
Source title: Proceedings of 2020 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2020
Affiliations: BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Mangement, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Alfiansyah, BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Mangement, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Puspitarini, A., BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Mangement, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Gomgom, BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Mangement, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Kriswandi, J., BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Mangement, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Setiadi, T., BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Mangement, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Rokanta, S.A., BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Mangement, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Baca Meter is an android-based mobile application which has been implemented and used in PDAM Kota Balikpapan to read and record Meter from each subscriber. Aim of this study is to analyze the effect of Baca Meter implementation and user ability on employee performance of Sub Bagian Pembaca Meter in PDAM Kota Balikpapan. Data collection performs by distributing questionnaires consisting of 20 questions to 36 employees of Sub Bagian Baca Meter. To evaluate the relation between variables, single and multiple linear regression were used. The result evidence, employee performance is influenced by the implementation of Baca Meter, but not influenced by the user's ability. Simultaneously, Implementation of Baca Meter and user ability influence employee performance by 37.9%, while the remaining 62.1% influenced by other variables outside this regression equation. Recommendation for next research and study is to analyze other variables which might significantly influence the employee performance of Sub Bagian Baca Meter in PDAM Kota Balikpapan. © 2020 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Employee performance; Mobile application; User ability; Water meter
Index Keywords: Information management; Linear regression; Surveys; Data collection; Employee performance; Mobile applications; Multiple linear regressions; Regression equation; Personnel rating

Title: Information technology adoption and competitive advantage of higher education
Source title: Proceedings of 2017 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2017
Affiliations: Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Rokanta, S.A., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Information technology (IT) is a tool to improve the education quality. The role of IT in education has become increasingly important in the present and the future. IT can be used to demonstrate learning objectives, improve access to information resources, build capacity and improve the quality of colleges that have competitive advantage. This paper aimed to understand how Adoption of IT has an important role in increasing the competitiveness of private higher education. This paper described the IT Adoption approach using the TOE framework and competitive advantage using the industry structure theory from Porter. © 2017 IEEE.
Author Keywords: adoption; competitive advantage; higher education; information technology
Index Keywords: Information management; Information technology; adoption; Competitive advantage; Education quality; Higher education; Industry structures; Information resource; Information technology adoption; Learning objectives; Competition
